thread.title: Love W Concept - Review
thread.title_full: Love W Concept - Review of W New York - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Giovanni E
title: Love W Concept - Review
text: I stayed for 1 night at W Tines Square and was an amazing experience the W concept are always in al the Hotels and I love it , the lobby bar rooms the view to Times Square , sometimes a little bit of noise outside but it's no problem to sleep and relax , the food was amazing , love W Hotels. Request the higher floor much better
